lines.text: [Bugs kisses Daffy, jams the barrel of his gun with a carrot and runs away]

[trying to pull the carrot out]
Dirtylittlecraddlefrajun...
[the gun goes off in Daffy's face]
Woo! I *love* him!
[Daffy drops dynamite into Bugs' borrow and hides behind a tree. However, the borrow moves and Bugs puts the dynamite behind Daffy and moves away without him noticing]

[looking out from behind the tree]
I love doing this, especially because I DESPISE him!
[Daffy pushes the T-shaped handle down and the dynamite explodes right behind him]
I think I'm going to cry.

[after being almost buried in the snow by an unexpected blizzard]
Winter does settle in rather suddenly at last!

[as Daffy levels his rifle at Bugs]
Er, uh, do I understand that you bear some sort of antipathy toward me?

[determined]
Antipathy, nothin'! I'm after that fur coat!
[Daffy feels Bugs' fur]

[impressed]
Say, that's the softest pelt I've ever felt!
Do you really like it? I get all my suits from the same tailor as the Duke of Windsor. I always get a good fit from him.

[levels his gun at Bugs again]
Never mind the sales pitch! Just skin the rabbit!

[pushing Daffy's gun away from him]
Eh, give me a sporting chance, doc.

[angry]
Stop fiddling with my rifle! I want to shoot you where it won't show!

[climbs up a tree]
You just can't get away from that pest.

[stops at the base of the tree]
Aha! *Now* you're trapped!
[Daffy places small logs around the tree and lights them]
I'll smoke him out!
[Daffy laughes evilly and points his gun up the tree]
You haven't got a chance!
[the heat from the fire melts the snow and ice on the tree, which comes down, puts out the fire and freezes Daffy]

[climbs down from the tree and walks away]
I'll see you after the Spring thaw pal.

[climbs out of the ice and tries to free his gun, which is frozen]
We'll see who has the last laugh around here!
[the gun goes off and Daffy avoids the shot]

[to the ice replica of himself]
Hey! Whose side you on fella?
[Bugs is by a frozen lake and Daffy is skiing down the hill towards him, firing his gun]

[fills a bucket with water from the lake]
I saw a guy do this in a toothpaste ad once.
[Bugs pours out the water and it instantly freezes]
TA-DA!
[Daffy crashes into it]
Invisible shield you know.
[last lines]
Well, time to join in for a long Winter's nap.
[calls to a tree where some bears are sleeping]
Ah, goodnight Daffy! Pleasent dreams!

[holding onto the top of the tree, shivering]
Pleasent dreams yeah. Dirtylittlecraddlefrajun...

[Sees the snowman Bugs made of himself]
Don't make a move or I'll pulverize you!
[the snowman's nose falls off]
You moved!
[Starts clubbing the snowman with his gun]
Take that and that and that!
[Realizes he's clubbing a bear underneath the snowman]
and that and that and... that
[cries]

[the bear takes a swipe at him]
Fortunately he missed me
[His body falls to pieces]
